Data Analytics campaign data interpretation and insights application

metadata.value:
5+ years experience as a manager leading AI/ML teams in an agile Technology/SaaS business, with a portfolio of large-scale AI/ML solutions, deployed globally. Experience working in customer-facing domains, accelerating adoption or growth through AI/ML-powered applications

Deep knowledge of industry-standard ML tools, frameworks, and cloud platforms
